scripts.install-systemd: mkdir -p ~/.config/systemd/user/ && cp -f server/hexo.service icecast/icecast2/icecast2.service icecast/ices2/ices2.service ~/.config/systemd/user/ && systemctl --user daemon-reload
scripts.enable: systemctl --user enable hexo && systemctl --user enable icecast2 && systemctl --user enable ices2
scripts.start: systemctl --user start hexo && systemctl --user start icecast2 && systemctl --user start ices2
scripts.restart: systemctl --user restart hexo && systemctl --user restart icecast2 && systemctl --user restart ices2
